You know what Skynet should have done?

Nuked all the military bases/production facilities then nuke the areas around it so hard that humans couldn't walk into it's hub without dying of radiation poisoning in minutes.  It would be kind of hard to destroy the hub of Skynet if no human can get near it without dying.
